verbs.description: First lady Melania Trump ’s life [V: might] not be as glamorous as it seems from the outside , according to French first lady Brigitte Macron .
[ARG1: First lady Melania Trump ’s life] [ARGM-MOD: might] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: be] [ARG2: as glamorous as it seems from the outside] , [ARGM-ADV: according to French first lady Brigitte Macron] .
First lady Melania Trump ’s life might not be as glamorous as it [V: seems] [ARGM-LOC: from the outside] , according to French first lady Brigitte Macron .
First lady Melania Trump ’s life might not be as glamorous as it seems from the outside , [V: according] to French first lady Brigitte Macron .
